actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from issuing oil and gas leases for waters off the coast of the State of New Jersey until the year 2000, and for other purposes.
short_title: New Jersey Offshore Oil and Gas Moratorium Act

summary.text: New Jersey Offshore Oil and Gas Moratorium Act - Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior, until the year 2000, from either conducting any preleasing activity or holding any lease sale with respect to the area seaward from the State of New Jersey.

titles.title: New Jersey Offshore Oil and Gas Moratorium Act
A bill to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from issuing oil and gas leases for waters off the coast of the State of New Jersey until the year 2000, and for other purposes.
